data.title: 750 Monza s
data.text:
Date Result Event Driver # Reference 1955/mar - Luigi Bordonaro di Chiaramonte, Palermo, I 1955/apr/04

19th OA

6th S+2.0 XV. Giro di Sicilia Luigi Bordonaro #437 1955/apr/11 1st OA Corsa al Monte Pellegrino Luigi Bordonaro #124 1955/apr/24 1st OA Messina - Colle San Rizzo hillclimb Luigi Bordonaro 1955/may/22 2nd OA Trapani-Monte Erice hillclimb Luigi Bordonaro #106 1955/jun/05 20th OA

2nd S+2.0 Circuito del Mugello

15 laps a 19,3km Luigi Bordonaro #126 1955/jul/23-24 IV. 10h di Messina (Notturna Messinese) Luigi Bordonaro / Luigi Piotti #10 0514M ? 1955/sep/18

3rd OA Catania-Casa Cantoniera

Catania-Etna Hillclimb Antonio Pucci # 1955/oct/16 dns Targa Florio Luigi Bordonaro / Anselmi #108 1956/may/10 1st OA Corsa al Monte Pellegrino Luigi Bordonaro 1956/jun/10 dnf Targa Florio Luigi Bordonaro / Antonio Pucci #106 1955/jun/26 2nd OA GP di Tunisi,

Belvédère Luigi Bordonaro #42 FY55 1956/aug/25-26 dn? 5h di Messina (Notturna Messinese) Luigi Bordonaro #4 BdN p109 195. - Barone Bernardo Cammarota, Palermo, I 1960/may/08 dnf

laps 6 / 10

S3.0 Targa Florio Domenico Tramontana /

Giuseppe Alotta #192 yellow triangle above the grill 1962 - Carlo Eduardo Leto di Priolo, I 1962-73 - displayed in the museum of the Autodromo di Monza 1973 - Alastair Walker, London, UK 1975 - A.J.M. "Dries" van der Lof, NL CaS 79 1978/jun/24 7th 2nd Zandvoort International Dries van der Lof #15 T&CC 9/78 p13 1978/nov - offered by Italian Classic Sports & Racing Cars (Rudy Pas), Rijsbergen, NL T&CC 11/78 p64 1979/jan - still offered by Rudy Pas C3 p13 T&CC 2/79 p60 1979 - José Segimon, E 198. - Chris Drake, Deeves Hall Cottage, Earls Lane, Ridge, Herts, GB T&CC 11/82 p88 1982/may/13-16 Mille Miglia Chris Drake / Richard Crump #122 1984/jul - offered by Chris Drake Collectors Cars Ltd., GB T&CC 8/84 p113 1986 - John Graham Foulston, UK (owner of Brands Hatch circuit) 1986 disq. Targa Florio Revival Foulston / Foulston #46 1987/sep/29 - Foulston died in a testing accident at Silverstone driving a McLaren M15 T&CC 12/87 p8 1987/sep/29 - Mary Foulston, UK 1994 - John Collins, Talacrest Ltd., Egham, UK 1994/jul/30-31 Coys Historic Festival, Silverstone 1995/jun - offered by Talacrest Ltd., Egham, UK for PDS 395,000 1995/jul/09 FOC Concours, Castle Ashby 1995/dec - offered by SMC, La Jolla, CA, USA for $650,000 1996/feb - offered by SMC, La Jolla, CA, USA for $695,000 1996/feb/22-25 - displayed at Techno Classica, Essen, D by SMC 1996/may - offered by Talacrest Ltd., Egham, UK for $550,000 (PDS 350,000) 1996/aug - offered by SMC, La Jolla, CA, USA for $650,000.- 1996/oct - offered by SMC, La Jolla, CA, USA for $650,000.- 1996 - Stan Zargorski, Mount Tremper, NY, USA 2000 - Giuseppe Scalvenzi, Brescia, I "ZA 035 RF" 2001/may/17-19 Mille Miglia Giuseppe Scalvenzi / Rosa Apostoli #273 2002/may/02-04 Mille Miglia Giuseppe Scalvenzi / Rosa Apostoli #234 2003/may/22-24 Mille Miglia Giuseppe Scalvenzi / Rosa Apostoli #280 2004/may/06-09 Mille Miglia Gieseppe Scalvenzi / Scalvenzi #333 2005/may/19-22 Mille Miglia Giuseppe Scalvenzi / Rosa Apostoli #276 2005 - displayed at Mille Miglia Museum, Brescia, I 2006/may/11-14 Mille Miglia L. Scalvenzi /
